hero.title: M.S. in Physics
hero.description: Recent graduate specialized in high-energy physics and data science. Currently seeking opportunities in research or data engineering.

preview.intro: I'm a recent physics graduate with a strong foundation in data analysis, statistical methods, and scientific computing. My academic journey has led me through both the theoretical foundations of physics and hands-on research with major international collaborations.
preview.highlight: From CERN experiments to personal tech projects, I enjoy solving complex problems and building tools that make data accessible.

full.intro: I'm Samuel, a recent graduate in Fundamental Physics from Université Clermont Auvergne. My specialization in particle physics has given me extensive experience with large-scale data analysis, statistical modeling, and scientific software development.
full.experience: During my master's program, I had the opportunity to work with both the LHCb and ATLAS collaborations at CERN. These experiences taught me to handle terabytes of data, implement complex analysis pipelines, and collaborate within international research teams.
full.passion: Beyond physics, I'm passionate about building systems and tools. I maintain a home server infrastructure, experiment with automation, and continuously explore new technologies. This website itself is a personal project where I apply modern web development practices.
full.goals: I'm currently looking for opportunities either in experimental physics research (PhD) or in data engineering roles where I can apply my analytical skills to real-world challenges.

stats.experimentsHover: within ATLAS & LHCb LPCA research groups
stats.reportsHover: Master's theses, project reports, and Beamer presentations

running.description: Trail running and ultra-marathons across mountain ranges. From 10K races to 100+ km ultra-trails, exploring the limits of endurance.

tech.title: Home Lab & Self-Hosting
tech.description: Building private cloud infrastructure with Proxmox, TrueNAS, and containerized services. Self-hosting for privacy and learning.

science.title: Science Communication
science.description: Communicating complex scientific concepts through visualization and storytelling. Making physics accessible to everyone.

preview.description: A selection of academic research, personal experiments, and professional work.
